Pre-Game Insights: Rishabh Pant and Suryakumar Yadav will be key to Indiaâ€™s chances with the bat should the Men in Blue suffer another top-order collapse.
The question remains if the team management will pick Yashasvi Jaiswal to open, which will mean Kohli revert back to his No 3 spot.
The focus will also be on spinners as the action shifts to the Caribbean completely, following the end of USA leg.
Kuldeep Yadav and Yuzvendra Chahal have not played a game and it will be interesting to see who makes the cut in the playing XI among the two.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Men in Blue finished Group A as table toppers with seven points from four matches.
Afghanistan beat Uganda by 125 runs before stunning New Zealand by 84 runs in their second match.
Afghanistan beat Papua New Guinea by seven wickets.
Afghanistan suffered a 106-run defeat to West Indies in their final group stage match, failing to chase down a target of 219.
Afghanistan cannot be taken lightly. They have match-winners in Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Gulbadin Naib and boast of a quality spin attack of Rashid Khan, Noor Ahmad, Mujeeb Ur Rahman and Mohammad Nabi.
Others: The 2024 T20 World Cup Super Eight match between India and Afghanistan will take place on 20 June, 2024 (Thursday).
The match will be held at Kensington Oval in Barbados.
The match is scheduled to begin at 8 pm IST, with toss at 7.30 pm IST.
The match will be telecast on the Star Sports Network TV channels and can be watched on the Disney + Hotstar app (Free) and the website (Subscription).
